metadata.title: RZ/G2L, RZ/G3S: Evaluation board kit and its startup process

sections.content:
Question:
Is there a guide on how to start the Evaluation Board Kit?
Answer:
The Evaluation Board Kit quick start guide is available below.
RZ/G2L 
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/qsg/rzg2l-evaluation-board-kit-quick-start-guide?r=1518686
RZ/G3S
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/gde/rzg3s-evaluation-board-kit-quick-start-guide?r=25458596
The quick start guide explains the Evaluation Board Kit contents and the startup process.
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L, RZ/G3S
